# Laplace

> Laplace distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var laplace = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/laplace' );
```

#### laplace

Laplace distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = laplace;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
